content:
67 combat clashes were recorded during the day. In total, the enemy inflicted 2 missile and 54 aircraft strikes, carried out 41 shelling of rocket launchers on the positions of our troops and settlements.

About thisinformsGeneral Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

In the estuary directionOur soldiers repelled 10 enemy attacks in the areas of the settlements of Bilohorivka, Zolotarivka in the Luhansk oblast and Yampolivka, Terny, Rozdolivka, Vesele in the Donetsk oblast, where the enemy, with the support of aviation, tried to break through the defenses of our troops.

In the Bakhmut directionOur soldiers repelled 5 enemy attacks in the areas of Bohdanivka, Ivanivske, Klishchiivka settlements of the Donetsk oblast.

In the Avdiivsky directionOur defenders reflect 11 enemy attacks in the areas of settlements Berdychi, Semenivka, Tonenko, Pervomaisk, Netaylovo, Nevelskoye Donetsk region.

In the Novopavlovsky directionThe defense forces continue to restrain the enemy in the areas of Krasnohorivka, Heorhiivka, Novomykhailivka, Vodyane, Urozhayne settlements, where the enemy, with the support of aviation, tried to break through the defenses of our troops 18 times.

In the Orikhiv directionThe enemy 5 times, with the support of aviation, attacked the positions of our defenders in the areas of settlements of Staromayorsk Donetsk region and a robot of Zaporizhzhya region.

In the Kherson directionDuring the day, the enemy made 3 attacks on the positions of our troops on the left bank of the Dnieper.

As reported by the Armyinform, on the Left Bank of the Dnieper Our Warriorsdestroyed the tank, 12 guns and 140 invaders.

Recall defense forcesshowedHunting for hostile equipment.
title: During the day at the front of 67 combatants: the enemy continues to storm the Avdiiv and Novopavlovsky directions
